meanings.definition: To operate a dial or rotary mechanism to select a telephone number.
meanings.sent1: She dialled her friend's number on the phone.
meanings.sent2: He always dials his mom when he needs advice.
meanings.sent3: The cat accidentally dialled 911 while playing with the phone.
meanings.sent4: His heart dialled the emergency line when he saw the accident.
meanings.sent5: The sound of the dialled number echoed in the quiet room.

meanings.definition: To make a phone call by entering a telephone number on a dial or keypad.
meanings.sent1: I dialled my sister to wish her a happy birthday.
meanings.sent2: They dialled the pizza place for delivery.
meanings.sent3: The robot dialled the wrong number and ended up ordering a thousand pizzas.
meanings.sent4: Her fingers dialled the number automatically, as if they had a mind of their own.
meanings.sent5: The melody of the dialled tones filled the room with a sense of nostalgia.

meanings.definition: To adjust or set a device by turning a dial or similar control.
meanings.sent1: He dialled the thermostat to a warmer temperature.
meanings.sent2: She dialled the radio to find her favorite station.
meanings.sent3: The magician dialled the magic wand to make it longer.
meanings.sent4: The artist dialled the colors on the palette to create a masterpiece.
meanings.sent5: The mechanic expertly dialled the engine to perfect performance.
